= 0.4 =

  * added an extra check to verify declared and documented method arguments quantity.

  * fixed bug for array of native types, it was generating native type instead of array of native. (thanks Herbert Souza)

----
= 0.3 =

  * added native PHP array type. You may use "array" or "struct" to use this type. The WSDL generated uses [http://www.w3.org/TR/2000/NOTE-SOAP-20000508/#_Toc478383522 soap-enc:Array] definition.
  * second argument WSDLDocument's constructor is not required. The default value of Soap Action URL is the current without parameters.

----

= 0.2 =

  * added documentation tags for class and methods/operations
  * allowed array of array for native and complex type (thanks [http://www.diogomoreira.com Diogo Moreira])

  * fixed bug: non public, static, constructor or magic methods could not go to WSDL
  * fixed bug: non public or static properties of complex types could not go to WSDL
